messages.message:
Intersys Consulting

Hi Brian, 

I am one of the Talent Acquisition Specialist here at Intersys and I came across your profile here on LinkedIn. We are looking at expanding our current teams and hiring at for our client in Phoenix, AZ for a .NET Architect role, as well as other Big Data and Development roles in Phoenix, Austin, and NYC and several other cities across the country.
Â 
I am not sure if you are open currently looking for a new opportunity, but if you happen to be looking, I would love to set up a time to discuss what you are looking for and if I might be able to help you in your search. Either way, please let me know your thoughts.

Thanks,
Courtney Harrington

Courtney Harrington
Talent Aquistion Specialist 
charrington@intersysconsulting.com
480-400-7055

Hi Brian,

If you are interested, I would love to send a job description to your email. Is there an email that it is best to reach you at?

Thanks,
Courtney
